\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{tikz}
\begin{document}

% Tree options
% Set the overall layout of the tree
\tikzstyle{level 1}=[level distance=6cm, sibling distance=15cm]
\tikzstyle{level 2}=[level distance=2.5cm, sibling distance=3cm]
\tikzstyle{level 3}=[level distance=2.5cm, sibling distance=1cm]
\tikzstyle{end} = [circle, minimum width=1pt, fill, inner sep=0pt]
% Define styles for categories and items
\tikzstyle{category} = [text width=5em, text centered]
